description: This file declares the APIs for managing and accessing time-related data within the COSA Data Model Library. It includes function prototypes for retrieving, setting, validating, committing, and rolling back time parameters, focusing on object interactions in the system.

methods.name: Time_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value associated with the Time object.

methods.name: Time_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves an integer parameter value associated with the Time object.

methods.name: Time_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value associated with the Time object.

methods.name: Time_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value associated with the Time object.

methods.name: Time_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for the Time object.

methods.name: Time_SetParamIntValue
methods.description: Sets an integer parameter value for the Time object.

methods.name: Time_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets an unsigned long parameter value for the Time object.

methods.name: Time_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for the Time object.

methods.name: Time_Validate
methods.description: Validates the current set of parameters before committing changes.

methods.name: Time_Commit
methods.description: Commits the parameter changes to persistent storage.

methods.name: Time_Rollback
methods.description: Reverts any uncommitted changes to the Time object parameters.
